title: Ancient Alchemy (Part 1)
body:
Ancient Alchemy (Part 1)

Half of Evan's upper body was buried at the bottom of the lake, with most of his bones fractured and internal organs damaged.

The impact of clashing against the turtle's tough shell by falling from a height of fifty thousand meters was already very powerful, and since he used Sky Fall as well, it placed an even greater burden on his body, resulting in a powerful backlash.

After sending a message to Nekros using his shadow senses, Evan immediately used the Death Transfer skill to recover because he had started to lose consciousness due to his severe injuries.

A dark purple light flashed around Evan's body, transferring all the damage he received to one of his shadow undeads. Once he healed himself, Evan pulled his body out from the bottom of the lake and quickly bolted toward the surface.
